name: AVAssetWriterInputMetadataAdaptor
desc: An object that appends timed metadata groups to an asset writer input.

items.name: init(assetWriterInput: AVAssetWriterInput)
items.desc: Creates a metadata group adaptor to append timed metadata groups to write to an output file.

items.name: func append(AVTimedMetadataGroup) -> Bool
items.desc: Appends a timed metadata group to the adaptor.

items.name: var assetWriterInput: AVAssetWriterInput
items.desc: The input for the metadata adaptor.
